attributes.action: press ahead urgently with the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Believing that such measures are urgently needed to reduce congestion on our roads, to protect our environment and repair the damage done by the massive increase in the use of cars and commercial vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
